sourcesContent: import{styled as e}from"../theme/stitches.config";export const StyledUser=e("div",{d:"inline-flex",p:"0 $sm",jc:"center",ai:"center",w:"max-content",maxWidth:"100%"});export const StyledUserInfo=e("div",{ml:"$sm",d:"inline-flex",fd:"column",whiteSpace:"nowrap"});export const StyledUserName=e("span",{fontSize:"$xs",color:"$text",lh:"$sm",tt:"capitalize",fontWeight:"$medium",maxW:"$60",to:"ellipsis",ov:"hidden"});export const StyledUserDesc=e("span",{fontSize:"$tiny",color:"$accents7","*:first-child":{mt:0},"*:last-child":{mb:0}});export const StyledUserLink=e("a",{a:{"&:hover":{opacity:.7}}});
